text: Mazima ddala mu Bantu ab'aweebwa ekitabo mulimu abantu abakkiriza Katonda nebakkiriza ebyassibwa gyemuli, nâ€™ebyassibwa gyebali, bagondera Katonda ebigambo bya Katonda tebabitundamu muwendo mutono, abo balina okufuna empeera yaabwe ewa Mukama omulabirizi waabwe, mazima Katonda tagenda kukaluubirirwa kubala
